name: Frog CCG
description:
Frog is a CCG single player game in which you play a wandering mage who comes across a snake blocking your path towards the forest.  

Download the file from the folder named Frog, to play the game use cards in your hand to fight the enemy. Each card has a energy cost with each turn having a total of 3 mana to spend on your cards in hand. Have fun and enjoy!!
